ilex.htr.mem_ifft

mem_ifft(x, fft_len, dat_len, _map='r+')[source]
Info:

Apply iFFT and save to temp memory map

Parameters:

  • x (ndarray) – data to fft

  • fft_len (int) – len of fft array

  • dat_len (int) – initial lenght of array

  • _map (str) – mapper, ‘r’ for read only or ‘r+’ read and writing. see mmap_mode in numpy.load()

Returns:

memory map of ifft

Return type:

xfft (memmap)
